oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl and Pearl Butler Press Release Cont.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Butler, Carl; Butler, Pearl; Moeller Talent, Inc.; Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white negative taped to and framed by a masking sheet containing the second page of a biography of Carl and Pearl Butler. The text describes songs written by Carl Butler, when Carl and Pearl started performing together, Pearl's hobbies, and Pearl's feelings on performing with her husband. The negative would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
